languages.text: Whenever the wielder starts their turn with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 MP and do not provoke attacks of opportunity this turn. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wielder starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever wielder starts their turn with no enemies in 3sq range, they have +4 MP and don't provoke Attacks of Opportunity this turn.
Base Armour Property: +10% Armour if wielder starts their turn with at least one enemy in 3sq range.

languages.text: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.
languages.original_text: Если в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа в радиусе 3 клеток от него нет врагов, персонаж получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца хода. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, если в начале хода персонажа в радиусе 3 клеток есть хотя бы 1 враг.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder starts their turn with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 MP and do not provoke attacks of opportunity this turn. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wielder starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde hiç düşman yokken başladıysa o tur için +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve o turda {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişi, turuna 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde en az 1 düşman varken başladıysa +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde hiç düşman yokken başladıysa o tur için +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve o turda {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişi, turuna 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde en az 1 düşman varken başladıysa +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}.

Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde hiç düşman yokken başladıysa o tur için +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve o turda {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Taban {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} özelliği: Kullanan kişi, turuna 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde en az 1 düşman varken başladıysa +%10 zırh.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador comienza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} sin enemigos en un radio de 3 casillas, gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante ese turno. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} si el portador comienza su turno con al menos 1 enemigo en un radio de 3 casillas.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador comienza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} sin enemigos en un radio de 3 casillas, gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} durante ese turno. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} si el portador comienza su turno con al menos 1 enemigo en un radio de 3 casillas.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果距装备者3格内的区域没有任何敌人，则装备者获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且本回合内不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。 基础护甲特性：回合开始时，如果距装备者3格内的区域至少有1名敌人，则获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果距装备者3格内的区域没有任何敌人，则装备者获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且本回合内不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。 基础护甲特性：回合开始时，如果距装备者3格内的区域至少有1名敌人，则获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} alors qu'il n'y a aucun ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases, il gagne +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} lors de ce tour. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} si l'utilisateur commence son tour avec au moins 1 ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} alors qu'il n'y a aucun ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases, il gagne +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} lors de ce tour. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} si l'utilisateur commence son tour avec au moins 1 ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases.

Quand l'utilisateur commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} alors qu'il n'y a aucun ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases, il gagne +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} lors de ce tour. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +10 % à l'Armure si l'utilisateur commence son tour avec au moins 1 ennemi dans un rayon de 3 cases.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、使用者の半径3セル以内に敵がいない場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+4を付与され、このターンは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を起こさない。 基本アーマー特性：ターン開始時、使用者の半径3セル以内に敵が1人以上いる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+10%。

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

traits.locale_text: ターン開始時、使用者の半径3セル以内に敵がいない場合、MP+4を付与され、このターンは機会攻撃を起こさない。 基本アーマー特性：ターン開始時、使用者の半径3セル以内に敵が1人以上いる場合、アーマー+10%。

languages.text: Befinden sich zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers in einem Radius von 3 Feldern keine Gegner, erhält er +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und provoziert in diesem Zug keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, wenn der Träger seinen Zug mit mindestens 1 Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern beginnt.
